entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Specifying enum typed discriminator on an entity type results in opaque ArgumentExceptions at query time #31547
  • EntityFramework 6.4.4 Add-Migration "Unrecognized command or argument 'VB'" #31546
  • EF Core upgrades to a distributed transaction when the TransactionScope contains multiple dbcontexts even if enlist is false #31544

Closed

  • Issue Connecting to Postgres Pgpool Server with Entity Framework Core #31545

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.6-pre20230809203314 to 2.1.6 #31548
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
    waiting-for-response
  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
    waiting-for-response
